GridView.Builder.description: Creates a scrollable, 2D array of widgets that are created on demand. Providing a non-null `itemCount` improves the ability of the [GridView] to estimate the maximum scroll extent.

GridView.Count.description: Creates a scrollable, 2D array of widgets with a fixed number of tiles in the cross axis.

GridView.Extent.description: Creates a scrollable, 2D array of widgets with tiles that each have a maximum cross-axis extent.

ListView.Builder.description: Creates a scrollable, linear array of widgets that are created on demand.Providing a non-null `itemCount` improves the ability of the [ListView] to estimate the maximum scroll extent.

ListView.Separated.description: Creates a fixed-length scrollable linear array of list 'items' separated by list item 'separators'.

Future Builder.description: Creates a Future Builder. This builds itself based on the latest snapshot of interaction with a Future.

toString.description: Returns a string representation of this object.
